description: Visuals emphasizing durable, high-standard infrastructure projects.

prompts.name: Newly Constructed Road
prompts.prompt: A wide, impressive shot of a newly constructed, high-quality road in Nigeria. The road should appear smooth, well-marked, and durable, possibly with a modern vehicle driving on it. The surrounding landscape should be clean and well-integrated. All SEES personnel in the image must have the company's logo branded on their attire. Uniform colors should be sky blue, white, or gray. If workers are present in an industrial setting, they must be in their PPE at all times. Style: clean, modern, progressive. Colors: Natural greens and blues, with crisp road markings, incorporating SEES brand colors (#0056b3, #f59e0b, #10b981). Lighting: Bright, clear, sunny. Focus: Durability, progress, quality.
prompts.platform_notes: For FB/IG: Use a drone shot for a grand perspective. Could be a short time-lapse video of the road construction process.

prompts.name: Modern Public Edifice
prompts.prompt: A modern, aesthetically pleasing public edifice (e.g., a school, hospital, or community center) built by SEES. The building should look functional, well-designed, and integrated into its environment. Show people (Nigerian, diverse ages) interacting around or entering the building, emphasizing its community impact. All SEES personnel in the image must have the company's logo branded on their attire. Uniform colors should be sky blue, white, or gray. If workers are present in an industrial setting, they must be in their PPE at all times. Style: inviting, functional, community-focused. Colors: Warm, natural tones for the building, vibrant colors for people, incorporating SEES brand colors (#0056b3, #f59e0b, #10b981) subtly. Lighting: Soft, natural. Focus: Community benefit, quality construction, social impact.
prompts.platform_notes: For FB/IG: Emphasize the human element and the positive impact on the community. Could be a short video showcasing the building's features and people using it.

description: Visuals highlighting advanced, safe, and efficient high-rise cleaning and painting solutions.

prompts.name: Robotic Facade Maintenance
prompts.prompt: A sleek, advanced robotic cleaning or painting drone/system operating smoothly on the exterior of a tall, modern high-rise building. The robot should look high-tech and precise, emphasizing safety and efficiency over manual labor. Show a clear, clean line where the robot has passed. All SEES personnel in the image must have the company's logo branded on their attire. Uniform colors should be sky blue, white, or gray. If workers are present in an industrial setting, they must be in their PPE at all times. Style: futuristic, precise, safe. Colors: Metallic tones of the robot, contrasting with the building facade, incorporating SEES brand colors (#0056b3, #f59e0b, #10b981). Lighting: Bright, clear. Focus: Innovation, safety, efficiency.
prompts.platform_notes: For FB/IG: Ideal for a short video clip of the robot in action, or a visually striking still that highlights the technology.

prompts.name: Before & After High-Rise Facade
prompts.prompt: A split image or composite. One side shows a section of a high-rise building facade that is visibly dirty, weathered, or faded. The other side shows the exact same section of the facade after SEES's automated cleaning/painting, looking pristine, vibrant, and new. The contrast should be dramatic and immediately apparent. All SEES personnel in the image must have the company's logo branded on their attire. Uniform colors should be sky blue, white, or gray. If workers are present in an industrial setting, they must be in their PPE at all times. Style: contrast, problem-solution, clean. Colors: Dull/faded on the 'before' side; bright, vibrant, and clean on the 'after' side, incorporating SEES brand colors (#0056b3, #f59e0b, #10b981). Focus: Transformation, quality, visual impact.
prompts.platform_notes: For FB/IG: Excellent for a before-and-after visual or a quick transition video. Ensure the visual improvement is striking.

description: Visuals emphasizing SEES's comprehensive process and collaborative approach in civil construction.

prompts.name: Collaborative Project Planning
prompts.prompt: A diverse team of SEES civil engineers and project managers (Nigerian, male and female) in a modern office or site trailer, gathered around a table. They are actively reviewing blueprints, 3D models, or digital project plans of a large-scale infrastructure project (e.g., a bridge, a complex road network). All SEES personnel in the image must have the company's logo branded on their attire. Uniform colors should be sky blue, white, or gray. If workers are present in an industrial setting, they must be in their PPE at all times. Conveys expertise, collaboration, and meticulous planning. Style: professional, collaborative, detailed. Colors: Clean, modern office aesthetics with subtle SEES branding colors (#0056b3, #f59e0b, #10b981). Lighting: Well-lit, focused on the team and plans. Focus: Expertise, teamwork, planning.
prompts.platform_notes: For FB/IG: Emphasize the team's interaction and the scale of the project. Could be a short video of the planning session.

prompts.name: Process from Concept to Concrete (Composite)
prompts.prompt: A composite image showing the seamless progression of a civil construction project. Elements include: a hand sketching a design or blueprint (concept), a construction site in progress with heavy machinery and workers (execution), and a beautifully completed, high-quality infrastructure project (e.g., a finished road section, a completed building facade). Seamless transitions between elements. All SEES personnel in the image must have the company's logo branded on their attire. Uniform colors should be sky blue, white, or gray. If workers are present in an industrial setting, they must be in their PPE at all times. Style: progressive, comprehensive, quality-focused. Colors: Natural, vibrant, with a sense of growth, incorporating SEES brand colors (#0056b3, #f59e0b, #10b981). Focus: End-to-end service, quality delivery, project completion.
prompts.platform_notes: For FB/IG: Ideal for a carousel ad or a quick video montage showing the progression of a project.

video_concepts.name: Building Nigeria's Future: SEES Civil Construction (Overview)
video_concepts.description: A dynamic video showcasing the breadth of SEES's civil construction projects and their impact on Nigeria's development.
prompt_elements: Opening shot: Dynamic animation of SEES logo with construction elements (e.g., a stylized bridge, road lines). Brand colors #0056b3, #f59e0b, #10b981 should be subtly incorporated throughout.

Scene 1: Quick cuts of various SEES civil construction projects: roads being built (asphalt laying, heavy machinery), public buildings under construction (framework, facade work), water channels being developed. All SEES personnel must have the company's logo branded on their attire. Uniform colors should be sky blue, white, or gray. Workers must be in their PPE at all times.
Scene 2: Drone shots of completed infrastructure projects, emphasizing scale and quality. Brand colors #0056b3, #f59e0b, #10b981 should be subtly incorporated throughout.
Scene 3: Happy Nigerian people using the new infrastructure (e.g., driving on a new road, entering a new school).
Voiceover: 'Building the foundations of a stronger Nigeria. SEES delivers high-standard civil construction for a sustainable future.'
On-screen text: 'Roads', 'Public Edifices', 'Water Channels', 'Global Standards'.
Closing: SEES logo, website URL, and a clear CTA: 'Explore Our Projects: [Website URL]'.
Music: Uplifting, patriotic, and professional.

video_concepts.name: High-Rise Maintenance: The Robotic Revolution (Innovation Focus)
video_concepts.description: A video highlighting SEES's innovative robotic solutions for high-rise building cleaning and painting.
prompt_elements: Opening: A dramatic, high-angle shot of a very tall, modern high-rise building. Brand colors #0056b3, #f59e0b, #10b981 should be subtly incorporated throughout.
Scene 1: Close-ups of dirt/weathering on the building facade (problem).

Scene 2: Introduction of SEES's robotic cleaning/painting system: show it being deployed, smoothly moving across the facade, emphasizing precision and safety. All SEES personnel must have the company's logo branded on their attire. Uniform colors should be sky blue, white, or gray. If workers are present in an industrial setting, they must be in their PPE at all times.

Scene 3: Before-and-after shots of a section of the building being cleaned/painted, with a clear visual transformation. Brand colors #0056b3, #f59e0b, #10b981 should be subtly incorporated throughout.
Voiceover: 'Elevate your building maintenance. SEES brings cutting-edge robotic solutions for safe, efficient, and superior high-rise cleaning and painting.'
On-screen text: 'Robotic Cleaning', 'Automated Painting', 'Enhanced Safety'.
Closing: SEES logo, website URL, and a CTA: 'Discover Innovation: [Website URL]'.
Music: Modern, high-tech, and efficient.

Scene 2: Material selection and quality control (e.g., inspecting construction materials). All SEES personnel must have the company's logo branded on their attire. Uniform colors should be sky blue, white, or gray. If workers are present in an industrial setting, they must be in their PPE at all times.

Scene 3: Construction in progress: skilled Nigerian workers and engineers on site, heavy machinery, adherence to safety protocols. All SEES personnel must have the company's logo branded on their attire. Uniform colors should be sky blue, white, or gray. Workers must be in their PPE at all times.
Scene 4: Quality assurance checks and final inspection of a completed project segment. Brand colors #0056b3, #f59e0b, #10b981 should be subtly incorporated throughout.
